title: Front Desk Manager Job at 1001luxerentals
content:
1001luxerentals, a furniture rental company located in Surulere, Lagos State, is recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:Front Desk Manager

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are a mid-sized law firm in Lagos seeking a professional, organized, and client-focused Front Desk Manager to be the first point of contact for our Firm.
	The ideal candidate will provide exceptional customer service, manage front-office operations, and support administrative functions to ensure smooth daily operations.


Key Responsibilities
Reception & Client Management:
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Greet and welcome clients, visitors, and guests in a professional and courteous manner.
	Manage incoming and outgoing calls, ensuring proper call screening and message-taking.
	Handle client inquiries and direct them to the appropriate department.
	Maintain a neat, organized, and professional front office environment.


Administrative Support:


	Manage appointment scheduling and maintain an efficient booking system for client meetings.
	Keep track of and manage conference room bookings.
	Receive, sort, and distribute mail, couriers, and office deliveries.
	Maintain office supplies inventory and ensure timely replenishment.
	Assist with data entry, document management, and filing.


Office Coordination & Support:


	Liaise with office staff, vendors, and service providers to ensure smooth daily operations
	Ensure compliance with the firm's security and visitor management protocols.
	Provide general administrative support to lawyers and other team members as required
	Assist in organizing firm events, meetings, and training sessions


Key Requirements


	Minimum of HND/Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration, Secretarial Studies, Public Relations or a related field.
	3 years of experience in a front desk, receptionist, or administrative role (law firm experience is a plus).
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills with a professional demeanor.
	Ability to handle confidential information with discretion.
	Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
	Excellent organizational and multitasking abilities.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, Outlook, PowerPoint).
	Familiarity with legal terminology is an added advantage.


Compensation & Benefits


	Salary: N300,000 - N350,000 Monthly.
	Competitive salary based on experience.
	Professional development opportunities.
	A structured and supportive work environment.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a cover letter to: careers@doa-law.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Accountant Job at Ascentech Services Limited
content:
Ascentech Services Limited is a full-fledged Human Resource Solution Provider incorporated in 2013 with its Head Office in Lagos, Nigeria. We are committed to forging long-term partnerships with our clients by creating and delivering robust and flexible services that address the changing needs of their business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accountant
Job Location: Sagamu, Ogun

Job brief
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for an Accountant to manage all financial transactions, from fixed payments and variable expenses to bank deposits and budgets at our Sagamu Factory.
	The ideal candidate’s responsibilities include auditing financial documents and procedures, reconciling bank statements and calculating tax payments and returns.


Responsibilities


	Manage all accounting transactions
	Prepare budget forecasts
	Handle monthly, quarterly and annual closings
	Reconcile accounts payable and receivable
	Ensure timely bank payments
	Compute taxes and prepare tax returns
	Manage balance sheets and profit/loss statements
	Reinforce financial data confidentiality and conduct database backups when necessary
	Comply with financial policies and regulations


Requirements and skills


	BSc in Accounting, Finance or relevant degree
	2-3 years of work experience as an Accountant
	Hands-on experience with accounting software like Sage50, Tally ERP and QuickBooks is a plus
	Strong attention to detail and good analytical skills.


Salary
N200,000 - N250,000 per month. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: cv@ascentech.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Job Vacancies at Zael Business Management & Consulting
content:
Zael Business Management & Consulting offers clients and candidates the confidence of specialist recruiters the have the depth and breath of experience across key sectors.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Account Officer

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Account Officer is responsible for supporting the hospital’s finance operations by managing day-to-day financial transactions, preparing and maintaining accurate financial records, reconciling accounts, processing payments and invoices, and ensuring compliance with hospital financial policies and relevant healthcare regulations.
	The role contributes to the efficient financial management of the hospital to support quality patient care.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting, Finance.
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in accounting, preferably in a hospital or healthcare setting.
	Proficiency in accounting software and the Microsoft Office Suite
	Professional certification is an advantage.
	Good knowledge of hospital billing and insurance procedures is an advantage.
	Strong analytical and numerical skills.
	High level of accuracy and attention to detail.
	Good communication and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to handle sensitive financial information with confidentiality.
	Ability to work independently and collaboratively within a team.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 per month. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info@zaelconsulting.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

2.) Registered Nurse / Midwife

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Responsibilities


	The Registered Midwife provides high-quality maternity care to women during pregnancy, labour, birth, and the postnatal period.
	The role involves monitoring maternal and fetal well-being, conducting deliveries, providing emotional support, and ensuring safe practices in line with established medical guidelines and hospital protocols.


Requirements


	Registered and licensed midwife with the appropriate regulatory body.
	Minimum of 3 years of relevant experience.
	Sound knowledge of maternal and newborn care, emergency obstetric care, and family planning.
	Excellent communication, interpersonal, and empathetic skills.
	Ability to remain calm and make quick decisions in high-pressure situations.
	Commitment to patient safety and high-quality care.


Salary
N150,000 - N170,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info@zaelconsulting.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Medical Officer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Medical Officer provides high-quality medical care to patients in line with clinical protocols and guidelines.
	They conduct patient consultations, diagnose and treat illnesses, manage emergencies, and participate in clinical governance activities to ensure safe and effective service deliver.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Medicine and Surgery
	Minimum of 3 years of post Nysc clinical experience.
	Valid license to practice from the relevant Medical Council.
	Proven clinical competence in general medicine and emergency care.
	Strong diagnostic and decision-making skills.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to work effectively in a multidisciplinary team.
	Willingness to work flexible hours, including nights and weekends if needed.


Salary
N400,000 per month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: info@zaelconsulting.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Job Location: Lagos

	We are seeking a highly skilled and detail-oriented Laboratory Scientist to join our team.

	This role requires strong analytical skills, a commitment to accuracy, and strict adherence to safety and quality standards.
